entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: On top of what has already fallen, expect 50 to 70 mm in the ranges and lesser amounts elsewhere. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h about the ranges. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
